text: motya is a rescued st. Bernard and we've
had her for about six and a half years
and her tongue measures from snout to
tip seven point three inches when we
open that Guinness World Records book
and see mo T's picture in there we're
going to feel very proud and it's going
to make all of the water and slobber
that we've cleaned up over the last six
and a half years well worth it
